text: Athirathan is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Pradeep Kumar. The film stars Suresh Gopi, Geetha, Jagathy Sreekumar and KPAC Lalitha in the lead roles. The film has musical score by Johnson. ==Cast== *Suresh Gopi as Sethu *Geetha as Devu *Jagathy Sreekumar as Shivaraman *KPAC Lalitha as Meenakshi *Suchitra as Nimmy *Siddique as James *Risabava as Benny Fernandez *Vijayaraghavan as Chandru *Prathapachandran as Andrew Georeg *Rajan P. Dev as Govinda Bhattacharya *James as Raghavan *M. S. Thripunithura as Advocate *Paravoor Bharathan as Kochettan *Zainuddin as Abu *Keerikkadan Jose as Gunda ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Johnson and the lyrics were written by Bichu Thirumala. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" !
